sentences.sContent: Tickets are available from the box office.
Meetings were held to update employees as soon as new information became available .
sentences.sCn: 一有新的信息就开会告诉员工。

sentences.sContent: Further building can continue when money is made available .
sentences.sCn: 有了资金就可以继续进一步的施工。

sentences.sContent: Every available space on the wall was covered in pictures.
sentences.sCn: 墙上每一个可用的地方都挂上了画。

sentences.sContent: ...I want my students to search out the answers to questions by using all the resources available to them...
...Grand is not available just now...
...Try and begin the search for available seats...
...nor is it for lack of available information...
...Abundant information about cooking is available either online or on TV...
...how-to videos and cooking classes available to anyone who has a computer...
...The ability to draw upon every available tool and...
...will probably only be available as e-books within a few years...
...Social drinking and partying are also widely available for Millennials...
...but at least the most senior were cushioned by a more readily available social safety net...
...it doesn't seem to be an accident that some of the cheapest daycare available is in the least regulated South...
...Neither do the foods sold at a snack-bar or those foods available elsewhere in the school...
...that information is stored on the cloud and is available for anyone reading the same textbook to come across...
...But the job starts on the first of May and I wouldn’t be available until June...
...The migration of old people from cold to warm places made many jobs available to the young...
...And it's true that there are currently more people applying for each available job opening...
...7 million people who wanted and were available for work hadn't looked within the last four weeks and were no longer even classified as unemployed...
...they often do not use available community services such as adult daycare centers...
...This enables him to reinterpret British cuisine depending on what is available in the local markets...

...there is an increase in the number of television channels available to viewers...
...How does Simon get to know about the company’s available posts...
...do you have any apartments available for under 500 dollars a month...

exam.question: Convenience foods which are already prepared for cooking are _______ in grocery stores.

answer.explain: 句意：  可供随时烹调的方便食品可以在杂货店买到。 ready： 准备就绪的； approachable： 可靠近的， 可接近的； probable：  很可能的， 大概的。

exam.question: In general, the amount that a student spends for housing should be held to one-fifth the total ________ for living expenses.

answer.explain: 句意：  一般而言， 一名学生用于住房的费用应该控制在他所有生活费的五分之一。acceptable：  可接受的； advisable：  可取的， 适当的， 贤明的； applicable：  能应用的， 合适的， 适用的。

synos.tran: [交]有效的，可得的；可利用的；空闲的

phrases.pCn: 可用于…的；对…有效的；能参加…的
可用基金；可动用的资金
可用物料；可用材料；良品可使用

remMethod.val: avail(效用， 利益) ＋ able(可…的) → 可取的

trans.tranOther: something that is available is able to be used or can easily be bought or found
